about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Echo Echelon!

What's included in the DLC:

Vinyl records "Ethereal" and "Aurora": Immerse yourself in the world of music with these two unique vinyl records. Discover new soundscapes that will accompany you!

New menu background and exclusive mini-profile: Upgrade your gaming profile with the new mini-profile specially created for the "Echo Echelon" add-on. Highlight your uniqueness among other players and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of your favorite game.

Don't miss the chance to get new customization items with "AnyWay! - Echo Echelon". Discover new sounds and upgrade your gaming profile right now!
